services.title: Our Services – Building Lives, One Step at a Time
services.subtitle: From the playground to the peace table, from skill-building workshops to the silent suffering behind bars—Vision Jeunesse Nouvelle is there. Serving with hands that heal, minds that teach, and hearts that transform.
services.introduction: At Vision Jeunesse Nouvelle, we serve youth and beyond—equipping individuals with tools, skills, and support to lead dignified, healthy, and purposeful lives. Whether through vocational training, health outreach, peacebuilding, or creative expression, our services reach communities across Rwanda and the region.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Vision Jeunesse Nouvelle (VJN) is a youth-led organization dedicated to empowering young people through education, economic development, health initiatives, peace building, and arts programs.

newsletter.title: Stay Connected
newsletter.description: Subscribe to receive updates about our programs, events, and opportunities to get involved.

hero.title: Empowering Youth for a Better Tomorrow
hero.subtitle: Building a brighter future through education, economic empowerment, and community development

about.description: Vision Jeunesse Nouvelle (VJN) is a youth-led organization founded in 2005, dedicated to empowering young people across Rwanda and the region through comprehensive programs in education, economic development, health, peace building, and arts.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Discover our comprehensive programs designed to empower youth and create lasting change in our communities

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.subtitle: Contact us today and become part of a growing movement to shape a better future

education.title: Education & Vocational Training
education.description: Providing quality education and vocational training to equip youth with essential skills for future success.

fullPage.title: Empowering Minds, Shaping Futures
fullPage.intro: At VJN, we believe that education is more than schooling—it's a gateway to dignity, independence, and purpose. Our Education Program targets youth from low-income and unemployed families, offering them the knowledge and skills to thrive in life and work.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
items: Vocational Training: Courses in sewing, hairdressing, welding, and mechanical automobile repair.
Literacy Support: We provide adult literacy and numeracy classes to reduce illiteracy in the region.
Inclusive Education: Special support for deaf and mute students to ensure no one is left behind.
Libraries & Learning Hubs: Access to books, digital resources, and research tools to inspire lifelong learning.

economic.title: Economic Empowerment
economic.description: Supporting youth entrepreneurship and economic development through training, mentorship, and resources.

fullPage.title: Building Skills for Financial Freedom
fullPage.intro: In a world of growing economic challenges, our Economic Empowerment Program equips youth with the tools to escape poverty and build thriving futures. From start-up basics to cooperative registration, we prepare young entrepreneurs to succeed.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
items: Entrepreneurship Training: Covering business planning, marketing, e-commerce, and customer service.
GSLA Formation: Supporting Group Savings and Loan Associations as vehicles for local development.
Market Linkages: We connect young producers with buyers, cooperatives, and trade fairs.
Business Law & Digital Finance: Basic legal literacy and digital banking access.

whoItServes.title: Who It Serves
items: Young women and men in informal sectors

health.title: Health & Well-being
health.description: Promoting physical and mental health through education, awareness, and access to healthcare services.

fullPage.title: Informed Youth, Healthier Communities
fullPage.intro: Good health is the foundation of strong societies. Through our Health Program, VJN empowers young people to protect themselves, spread awareness, and challenge stigma around sexual and reproductive health.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
items: Youth-Friendly Health Services: Partnering with clinics and schools for inclusive access.
Peer Educator Training: Mobilizing youth to educate others on HIV/AIDS, STIs, and reproductive rights.
Awareness Campaigns: Focused on family planning, mental health, obesity, and substance abuse.
Pandemic Response: COVID-19 education and safety practices for youth groups.

peace.title: Peace Building
peace.description: Building bridges and fostering understanding through dialogue and community engagement.
peace.subtitle: Building bridges and fostering understanding
peace.fullDesc: Our peace building program focuses on creating sustainable peace through dialogue, education, and community engagement.

arts.title: Sports, Culture & Arts
arts.description: Nurturing creativity and cultural expression through sports, arts, and cultural activities.

fullPage.title: Where Talent Meets Transformation
fullPage.intro: We believe in the power of expression. Our Sports, Culture & Arts Program gives young people a platform to showcase their gifts while building confidence, discipline, and purpose through performance and play.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
items: Sports Leagues & Competitions: Football, volleyball, basketball, and athletics programs for youth.
Artistic Development: Music, dance, theater, and visual arts workshops for self-expression.
Cultural Celebrations: Events that preserve and promote traditional Rwandan and African culture.
Life Skills through Talent: Leadership, teamwork, and emotional resilience training through creative outlets.

whoItServes.title: Who It Serves
items: Young people at risk of crime or isolation

culture.title: Sports, Culture & Arts
culture.description: We uncover and develop youth talent in sports, music, and visual arts, creating spaces for self-expression and community healing.

finalCta.title: Interested in one of our programs? Want to bring VJN to your community?
finalCta.subtitle: Let's build the future together—one skill, one voice, one goal at a time.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Through our programs, we've reached thousands of young people, providing them with the tools and opportunities they need to succeed.

item1.title: New Youth Center Opens in Nyundo
item1.excerpt: Expanding our reach to serve more young people in the Western Province

item2.title: Peace Building Workshop Success
item2.excerpt: Over 100 youth leaders trained in conflict resolution and community dialogue

repository.title: Youth Group Repository
repository.description: Access our comprehensive database of youth groups and organizations. Register your group to connect with others and access resources.

partner.title: Partner With Us
partner.description: Join us in our mission to empower youth and build stronger communities. Your support can make a lasting impact.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.address: Rubavu District, Gisenyi Sector, Nengo Cell, Gikarani Village

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Empowering youth for a better future
about.mission.text: The VJN mission is to develop the talents, the capacities of young people, and promote positive and spiritual values for their involvement in the process of sustainability and socio-economic development.
about.vision.text: Rwandan youth are physically, morally, spiritually renewed and are productive and dynamic for a better future

foundingMembers.title: Founding Members
foundingMembers.text: Meet the individuals who laid the foundation for Vision Jeunesse Nouvelle.

donate.title: Support Our Cause
donate.description: Your generous donation helps us continue our work and make a positive impact in the community. Every contribution, no matter the size, makes a difference.

donationModal.title: Make a Donation
donationModal.subtitle: Your support makes a difference
donationModal.description: Your contribution will help us continue our mission of empowering Rwandan youth. Please enter the amount you would like to donate.
donationModal.paypalDescription: You will be redirected to PayPal to complete your payment securely.
